title: Elegant Pearl and Emerald Chandbali Earrings - Adorable Karna Pathakam
materials: 22K Gold Plated Alloy. Features a striking Emerald Green Gemstone Cabochon
sparkling Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones and lustrous cultured Pearls. Finished with a traditional Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: Classic chandbali design with a modern twist. The intricate floral pattern is studded with high-quality Cubic Zirconia stones, providing exceptional brilliance. A teardrop-shaped Emerald Cabochon anchors the design. The pearl drops add a touch of traditional South Indian elegance. The design is light weighted and comfortable.
occasions: and other special occasions. Suitable for both traditional attire like sarees and lehengas and modern outfits.
description: These earrings blend traditional chandbali design with a contemporary feel, making them versatile for any occasion. The high-quality Cubic Zirconia stones provide a diamond-like sparkle without the diamond price. The Hyderabadi polish ensures durability and a long-lasting shine. A perfect balance of elegance and affordability.
